meanings.sent1: The gutty firefighter rushed into the burning building to save the family.
meanings.sent2: She admired her gutty friend who always stood up for what was right.
meanings.sent3: The gutty little squirrel bravely faced the big, scary dog in the park.
meanings.sent4: His gutty decision to speak up against injustice inspired others to do the same.
meanings.sent5: The gutty knight fearlessly faced the dragon to protect the kingdom.

meanings.definition: A person who is brave or determined.
meanings.sent1: The gutty never gave up on their dreams, no matter the obstacles.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the gutty of the group for always taking risks.
meanings.sent3: The gutty in the story saved the day with their quick thinking and bravery.
meanings.sent4: Being a gutty means facing challenges head-on with unwavering resolve.
meanings.sent5: The gutty's actions inspired others to be courageous in the face of adversity.

meanings.definition: Having a strong or robust physical constitution.
meanings.sent1: His gutty physique allowed him to endure the long hike without tiring.
meanings.sent2: The gutty athlete never backed down from a physical challenge.
meanings.sent3: Despite his gutty appearance, he was actually quite gentle and kind.
meanings.sent4: The tree's gutty roots held firm against the strong winds of the storm.
meanings.sent5: The old car's gutty engine roared to life after years of sitting idle.
